result.eng: He is the richest person on the face of the earth.
result.ga: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talún
result.orig: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talún
result.html: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talúnHe is the richest person on the face of the earth.
result.ponchtml: Is eisean an duine is saiḃre ar ḋroim na talúnHe is the richest person on the face of the earth.

result.eng: The child's face lit up with joy.
result.ga: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthas
result.orig: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthas
result.html: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthasThe child's face lit up with joy.
result.ponchtml: Las aġaiḋ an ṗáiste le háṫasThe child's face lit up with joy.

result.html: Nigh d'éadanWash your face.
result.ponchtml: Niġ d'éadanWash your face.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ga: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.orig: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.html: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: Ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.orig: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.html: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris meangaḋ gáire amaċ ar aġaiḋ an ḟáilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
